Privacy Policy Effective Date: Nov 11, 2023 This Privacy Policy applies to
Monsterbrew GPT ("we," "us," or "our") and explains our practices regarding
the collection, use, and disclosure of information that we receive when you
use our GPT.

Information Collection and Use We firmly believe in the
importance of your privacy and are committed to creating a safe and secure
environment for all our users.

Hence, we do not collect, store, or use any
personal data from our users.

This includes, but is not limited to, personal
identifiers, contact information, demographic details, financial data, and any
other type of data that could be used to identify or contact you.

Non-
collection of Sensitive Information We do not collect sensitive personal
information such as health-related data, political opinions, religious or
philosophical beliefs, or any other categories of sensitive information.

Data Security As we do not collect any personal data, there is no risk of such
data being accessed, used, or disclosed by any third parties.
